lines.text: Maybe... he was counting on the goat being afraid of the fire.
You look pretty strong, huh? Maybe he wanted to make you panic and break loose!
A goat charging around would definitely distract Slick, right?
He set himself and the hay on fire, hoping the goat would get spooked and come to the rescue!
I mean, look at that thing. That chain looks pretty sturdy.
If the goat didn't break it tryin' to get at the hay on the other side of the room, well...
It sure wouldn't break it tryin' to run in the opposite direction.
I mean, blind panic, it might've run towards the flame...
Oh, sure you're not stupid. Lookit %MX% Big Brain over here!
